properties.description: Creation of a view of organisation unit for PBI Reports

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_employee_leavers

AS

SELECT DISTINCT 

    T1.EmployeeID as PersNo,
    T2.LastName,
    T2.FirstName,
    T1.CoCd,
    T1.CompanyCode,
    T4.LocationID as Loc,
    T4.LocationCode as Location,
    T10.PSGroupCode as PSGroup,    
    T10.Description as PayBandDescription,
    T6.OrganisationUnit as OrgUnit,
    T6.Description as OrganisationalUnit,
    T7.PersonnelAreaCode as PA,
    T7.Description as PersonnelArea,
    T8.PersonnelSubAreaCode as PSubArea,
    T8.Description as PersonnelSubArea,
    T3.ContractCode as WorkC,
    T3.Description as WorkContract,
    T.EmploymentStartDate as OrgStartDate,
    T.EmploymentEndDate as Leaving,
    --Act 
    --ActionType 
    --ActR,
    T2.ReasonForAction,
    --S
    T2.EmploymentStatus,
    T11.EmployeeNumber,
    T9.PositionCode as Position,
    T9.Description as Position1,
    T2.AnnualSalary,
    T2.Currency,
    -- UserID
    T2.EmailAddress,
    TM3.EmployeeID as PersNo1,
    CONCAT(TM3.FirstName, ' ', TM3.LastName) AS NameOfManager,
    TM2.PositionCode AS ManagerPosition,
    TM3.EmailAddress AS LMEmail,

    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_leavers_dim T
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact T1 ON T.EmployeeID = T1.EmployeeID and T1.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim T2 ON T1.EmployeeID = T2.EmployeeID and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim T3 ON T1.ContractID = T3.ContractID and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_pins_location_dim T4 ON T1.LocationID = T4.LocationID and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T5 ON T1.EmployeeID = T5.EmployeeID and T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_organisation_unit_dim T6 ON T1.OrganisationalUnitID = T6.OrganisationUnitID and T6.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_area_dim T7 ON T1.PersonnelAreaID = T7.PersonnelAreaID and T7.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim T8 ON T1.PersonnelSubAreaID = T8.PersonnelSubAreaID and T8.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim T9 ON T1.PositionID = T9.PositionID and T9.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payband_dim T10 ON T1.PaybandID = T10.PaybandID and T10.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T11 ON T1.EmployeeID = T11.EmployeeID and T11.IsActive = 'Y'

-- manager tables
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact TM1 ON T5.ManagerEmployeeID = TM1.EmployeeID and TM1.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim TM2 ON TM1.PositionID = TM2.PositionID and TM2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim TM3 ON TM1.EmployeeID = TM3.EmployeeID and TM3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y'
